meanings.definition: A synthetic corticosteroid drug used to treat inflammation and autoimmune conditions.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed methylprednisolone to reduce the swelling in my joints.
meanings.sent2: My friend takes methylprednisolone for her arthritis.
meanings.sent3: After taking methylprednisolone, I felt like a deflated balloon.
meanings.sent4: The methylprednisolone worked like a superhero, fighting off the inflammation in my body.
meanings.sent5: The methylprednisolone was like a soothing balm, calming the autoimmune storm within me.

meanings.definition: The generic name for a medication commonly sold under the brand name Medrol.
meanings.sent1: I asked the pharmacist for the methylprednisolone instead of the brand name.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended switching to methylprednisolone to save on costs.
meanings.sent3: When I saw the price difference, I realized the true value of methylprednisolone.
meanings.sent4: Using methylprednisolone felt like unlocking a secret code to affordable medication.
meanings.sent5: The word 'methylprednisolone' sounded like a magic spell that could make my wallet happy.
